frontmatter.title: Exploring the Benefits and Limitations of Progressive Web Apps
frontmatter.description: In this blog post, we will take a closer look at Progressive Web Apps and what sets them apart from regular web applications or native mobile apps. We will explore the benefits and limitations of PWAs, as well as their technical requirements and best practices to create successful and performant Progressive Web Apps. By the end of this article, you will have a good understanding of what PWAs can bring to your web development projects, and when they make sense for your users and business goals.
